content: diamond hat sizes baby child adult needles us 4 16 circular us 6 16 circular us 6 double pointed needles yarn 3 different colors of dk weight yarn i used looped yarn works dk weight which is 60% merino and 40% romney wool and has 265 yds notions stitch markers tapestry needle cast on with smaller circular needle cast on 72 96 120 sts i used the long tail co join to work in the round being careful not to twist sts place marker ribbing k1 tbl p1 - repeat to end of round continue in k1 tbl p1 ribbing until band measures 1 5 2 3 from co edge or to desired length body change to larger circular needle and knit one round plain in ribbing color begin chart pattern repeat chart pattern until hat measures 3 5 3 75 4 25 from edge of ribbing or to desired length crown shaping stop following chart and change to main color only k6 k2tog repeat to end of round next round knit k5 k2tog repeat to end of round next round knit k4 k2tog repeat to end of round next round knit k3 k2tog repeat to end of round change to dpns when needed continue decreasing in this manner until 9 12 15 sts remain cut yarn leaving about a 6 tail thread tail on tapestry needle and bring through remaining sts weave in ends and block gently pom poms are highly encouraged ©anne mizoguchi 2016
